definition: to convert to (a religion)/to rely upon/refuge/mainstay

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
to depend on/to comply with or listen to sb/according to/in the light of
the Three Pillars of Faith (Buddha, dharma, sangha)/see also 三寶|三宝[san1 bao3]

sentences.english: Life can drift, can alone, but the soul has to be a refuge.
sentences.chinese: 生活可以漂泊，可以孤独，但灵魂必须有所归依。

sentences.english: The Buddha is my foremost refuge.
sentences.chinese: 我别无归依，佛是我的至上归依。

sentences.english: The Buddha is my foremost refuge.
sentences.chinese: 我别无归依，佛是我的至上归依。

sentences.english: The proper response to the Buddha as refuge is trust and confidence.
sentences.chinese: 把佛陀作为归依的正确态度，是信任与信心。

sentences.english: May the Blessed One remember me as a lay follower who has gone to him for refuge, from this day forward, for life.
sentences.chinese: 愿薄伽梵记得我这个从今日起一生归依于他的优婆夷。

sentences.english: The Dhamma is my foremost refuge.
sentences.chinese: 我别无归依，法是我的至上归依。

sentences.english: The Dhamma is my foremost refuge.
sentences.chinese: 我别无归依，法是我的至上归依。

sentences.english: I should like to find a final resting place within sound of its surf.
sentences.chinese: 我乐意寻找，最后的归依，伴随著浪涛漾岸的声音。

sentences.english: The Buddha serves as a refuge by teaching the Dhamma.
sentences.chinese: 佛陀作为归依的功能，是借着传法进行的。

sentences.english: The Sangha is my foremost refuge.
sentences.chinese: 我别无归依，僧是我的至上归依。

sentences.english: The Sangha is my foremost refuge.
sentences.chinese: 我别无归依，僧是我的至上归依。
